title: T'bird:  Can't log into Yahoo Mail - wrong p/w, but identical log-on & p/w work perfectly w/ Firefox; any ideas?
content:
T'bird: Can't log into Yahoo Mail - wrong p/w, but identical log-on & p/w work perfectly using Firefox; any ideas?

I've deleted cookies, and checked exact log-on & p/w characters. I've deleted old Yahoo p/w.

I'm wondering if Yahoo is blocking T'bird in favor of its own email program?
creator: return335
